医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
瑞典 25 年研究揭示道路交通污染与死亡风险增加之间的联系探索道路交通污染与死亡风险增加之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/25-year-Swedish-study-reveals-link- Between-road-traffic-pollution-and-increased-mortality-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/25-year-Swedish-study-reveals-link- Between-road-traffic-pollution-and-increased-mortality-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7870b4a8-14a7-4ca5-b970-e3796088c332 Thu, 09 Nov 2023 04:15:00 -0500 25-year Swedish study reveals link between road traffic pollution and increased mortality risk
使用 INTEGRA Biosciences 的新电子书实现无压力移液INTEGRA Biosciences 很高兴地宣布发布一本新电子书，提供完整的移液指南。液体处理方案构成了许多生命科学工作流程的支柱，掌握正确的移液操作对于获得可靠的实验结果起着至关重要的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Achieve-stress-free-pipetting-with-INTEGRA-Biosciencese28099-new-eBook.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231109/Achieve-stress-free-pipetting-with-INTEGRA-Biosciencese28099-new-eBook.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2bed3cbb-9104-4ea9-a88e-daba137c658a Thu, 09 Nov 2023 03:36:00 -0500 Achieve stress-free pipetting with INTEGRA Biosciences’ new eBook
基因熔炉：研究揭示了欧洲血统人群中的复杂混合物在《自然通讯》最近的一项研究中，研究人员发现欧洲人和欧洲美国人拥有显着的次大陆遗传混合，挑战了这些人群是同质的观念。这一发现表明需要重新评估遗传流行病学研究，这些研究可能忽略了混合对这些群体中疾病关联和性状遗传力的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Genetic-melting-pot-Study-unveils-complex-admixture-in-European-ancestry-populations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Genetic-melting-pot-Study-unveils-complex-admixture-in-European-ancestry-populations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efc91189-4d08-449e-bbbc-54dc50dbed9d Wed, 08 Nov 2023 23:31:00 -0500 Genetic melting pot: Study unveils complex admixture in European ancestry populations
描绘 IBD 治疗的未来：从免疫调节剂到 microRNA 疗法在《eGastroenterology》杂志最近发表的一项研究中，研究人员深入研究了治疗炎症性肠病 (IBD) 的最新治疗策略，包括溃疡性结肠炎和克罗恩病。该论文讨论了从免疫调节药物和生物制剂到 microRNA 上调剂和干细胞疗法等新方法的新兴治疗方法，强调了 IBD 护理中对精准医疗的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Charting-the-future-of-IBD-treatment-From-immune-modulators-to-microRNA-therapie.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Charting-the-future-of-IBD-treatment-From-immune-modulators-to-microRNA-therapie.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20622dcb-d40b-4b09-abbb-7affe8ed5e26 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 23:15:00 -0500 Charting the future of IBD treatment: From immune modulators to microRNA therapies
疾病预防控制中心报告称，美国先天性梅毒病例的增加与检测和治疗失败有关《发病率和死亡率每周报告》中的一项分析强调，由于检测和治疗方面的差距，美国先天性梅毒病例激增，强调需要加强产前护理策略，以有效对抗这种可预防的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Rise-in-US-congenital-syphilis-cases-linked-to-testing-and-treatment-failures-CDC-reports.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Rise-in-US-congenital-syphilis-cases-linked-to-testing-and-treatment-failures-CDC-reports.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d3249e6-7460-4bb4-8e22-9fe36bbe91a2 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 22:50:00 -0500 Rise in US congenital syphilis cases linked to testing and treatment failures, CDC reports
一项强有力的审查为美国卫生政策提供了信息，氟化物和密封剂战胜了青少年龋齿在 JAMA 网络的全面审查中，研究人员发现氟化物治疗和密封剂等预防性口腔健康干预措施可有效对抗青少年龋齿，为美国预防服务工作组和医疗保健提供者提供了可行的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Fluoride-and-sealants-win-against-youth-dental-caries-a-robust-review-informs-US-health-policy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Fluoride-and-sealants-win-against-youth-dental-caries-a-robust-review-informs-US-health-policy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=572571bd-c09c-4c7a-8eaa-5e411a14513d Wed, 08 Nov 2023 22:36:00 -0500 Fluoride and sealants win against youth dental caries, a robust review informs US health policy
大麻及其衍生物有望减轻体重和腰围，并对身体脂肪产生微妙的影响《国际肥胖杂志》上的研究报告称，大麻及其衍生物可能会影响体重和腰围，对身体脂肪产生不同的影响，这表明大麻及其衍生物有可能作为肥胖管理的治疗辅助手段。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Cannabis-and-derivatives-show-promise-in-reducing-weight-and-waist-circumference-with-nuanced-effects-on-body-fat。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Cannabis-and-derivatives-show-promise-in-reducing-weight-and-waist-circumference-with-nuanced-effects-on-body-fat。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3dbc961-cb43-4e35-a71f-61d5dd90769f Wed, 08 Nov 2023 22:13:00 -0500 Cannabis and derivatives show promise in reducing weight and waist circumference, with nuanced effects on body fat
大麻的使用改变了 DNA 甲基化，其影响超出了吸烟的影响分子精神病学中的一项大规模荟萃分析表明，终生吸食大麻与外周血 DNA 甲基化变化有关，这可能对了解吸食大麻对健康的长期影响具有重要意义。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Cannabis-use-alters-DNA-methylation-with-implications-beyond-smoking-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Cannabis-use-alters-DNA-methylation-with-implications-beyond-smoking-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c743aba-48ad-414a-9d77-c661901b5694 Wed, 08 Nov 2023 21:31:00 -0500 Cannabis use alters DNA methylation, with implications beyond smoking effects
全球研究重点关注电子烟使用者的电子烟呼吸风险VERITAS 研究是一项全球横断面调查，旨在通过专门关注吸电子烟但从未吸烟的个体来隔离电子烟对呼吸系统健康的影响，为使用电子烟的直接后果提供独特的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Global-study-zeroes-in-on-vapings-respiratory-risks-among-exclusive-e-香烟-users.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Global-study-zeroes-in-on-vapings-respiratory-risks-among-exclusive-e-香烟-users.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c334319-b8de-4293-98d3-2623c5ca702a Wed, 08 Nov 2023 18:17:00 -0500 Global study zeroes in on vaping's respiratory risks among exclusive e-cigarette users
人体组织模型揭示了尿路感染细菌策略的多样性这项研究今天发表在《科学进展》上，首次使用复杂的人体组织模型来探索引起尿路感染的六种常见物种的宿主和病原体之间的相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Human-tissue-model-reveals-diversity-of-bacterial-strategies-for-urinary-tract-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231108/Human-tissue-model-reveals-diversity-of-bacterial-strategies-for-urinary-tract-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e567401-948c-43df-a008-397cdb7f4b9c Wed, 08 Nov 2023 15:36:00 -0500 Human tissue model reveals diversity of bacterial strategies for urinary tract infections
